pluginInfo.tool-description: Datical DB makes it incredibly easy to automate and manage database schema changes for high volume, complex releases, across any environment, for any database. No agents required.

meta.content: Datical DB makes it incredibly easy to automate and manage database schema changes for high volume, complex releases, across any environment, for any database. No agents required.
meta.name: description

release-notes.release-note: Added support for new Datical DB actions
Added support for new Email Report
Removed Email Report. Should rely on other plugins for that.
Added Pipeline parameter to Deploy Command
Added Support for Runtime Credentials in Forecast, Deploy, Status and Status Details steps
